title: The Unexpected Heroism of Kevin Roberts
summary: Kevin Roberts, a 78-year-old with a passion for sports and counseling, discovers his hidden powers and saves his community from disaster.
summaryGerman: Kevin Roberts, ein 78-jähriger mit einer Leidenschaft für Sport und Beratung, entdeckt seine verborgenen Kräfte und rettet seine Gemeinde vor einer Katastrophe.
summaryDutch: Kevin Roberts, een 78-jarige met een passie voor sport en counseling, ontdekt zijn verborgen krachten en redt zijn gemeenschap van een ramp.
summaryFrench: Kevin Roberts, 78 ans, passionné de sport et de conseil, découvre ses pouvoirs cachés et sauve sa communauté d'une catastrophe.

story.text: At the park, while playing his favourite sport, tennis, Kevin feels an unusual surge of energy.
Kevin counsels a young couple struggling with communication, lifting their spirits and his own.
The city alarm sounds! A chemical spill at a nearby factory. Despite the danger, Kevin heads towards the spill.
Kevin reaches the spill and discovers he can purify air. He works tirelessly, dispersing the toxic fumes.
The city celebrates Kevin, who is hailed as a hero. Newspapers call it 'The Miracle of the Gentle Elder'.
Kevin returns to his usual weekend routine, feeling a deeper connection with his community.
Reflecting on his week, Kevin realizes the extent of his powers and decides to dedicate more time to help others.

ending: Even at 78, Kevin Roberts proved that heroes come in all ages, defining a true superhero's spirit.
moral: Age is just a number when it comes to making a difference in the world.
